function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited mobility and regulation in a pandemic area","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to limited mobility and regulations","Mitigation":"Improving infrastructure and regulations for pandemic areas, promoting alternative modes of transport","Technologies":"Mobile applications for contact tracing, smart infrastructure for crowd monitoring","People":"Residents in pandemic areas, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate room quality in an apartment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to poor living conditions","Mitigation":"Improving room quality, promoting proper ventilation and sunlight exposure","Technologies":"Biophilic design, smart ventilation systems, solar-powered air purifiers","People":"Residents in apartments, landlords, building managers","Owner":"Building owners, designers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of connection to nature, daylight, and fresh air in housing and residential areas","Impact":"Reduced mental and physical well-being, increased risk of illness","Mitigation":"Incorporating biophilic design, promoting access to nature, improving ventilation and daylighting","Technologies":"Biophilic design principles, natural ventilation systems, smart window technologies","People":"Residents, housing developers, architects","Owner":"Building owners, architects, public health authorities"}]}
